article_title: Comprehensive Immigration Reform Is A Balance Of Compassion Versus Cost

article_metadata.author: Jeffrey Dorfman

og.description: Comprehensive immigration reform would be compassionate for all those gaining new rights and privileges, but the cost of that compassion would be an enormous burden on taxpayers.
og.title: Comprehensive Immigration Reform Is A Balance Of Compassion Versus Cost
